4 of us went tonight and had the fixed price dinner, just 26 euros each.    It was wonderful and amazingly affordable for the quality and quantity and service providedIncluded was a glass of wine, a liter of sangria  (for 2), great bread, appetizers, entree and dessert We had a large portion of clams for the appetizer.  For dinner two of us had wonderful ahi tuna and two had Dover sole.    Excellent Desert was catalian cream (creme brulee), sorbet and a brownie with ice creamWe had an additional pitcher of Sangria and bottled water and the total bill was 111 euros for 4 peopleDefinitely a great place that you'll enjoy
